lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic opened his season with a 6-2, 6-2 first-round win over German qualifier Dustin Brown on Monday at the Qatar Open.
snippet: Novak Djokovic opened his season with a 6-2, 6-2 first-round win over German qualifier Dustin Brown on Monday at the Qatar Open....

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Opens Season With Win at Qatar Open
headline.print_headline: Novak Djokovic Opens Season With Win at Qatar Open
